name: No Time For Blood BETA 0.1
description:
The reason i went from happy childish games to a gritty serious one is because I've always loved action games, FPS's and things like James Bond Movies.

Play as Cubey were  your main objective is to pass the 5 beta levels and collect all the PeperDR!

Controls:

WASD For Movement 

CTRL For Crouch (command if you are on mac)

Right Click And Left Click For Grappling 

Note: THIS IS NOT A RIPOFF OF KARLSON I'M JUST HEAVILY INSPIRED.   i love Dani's work tho and i love Karlson so plz don't take this the wrong way.
